name: Dragon Stick: Legend Z Warrior
description:
Dragon Stick: Legend Z Warrior is a fighting games and dragon heroes fighters?
In Versus, you will choose one and fight the others in 1 vs 1 “or transformation to ssj, ssj2/3 and 4, all heroes and villains form db Z /KAI/GT. Fighter Z” to fight against enormous Dragon bosses, the most dangerous enemy in the universe. In Tournament, fight with the strongest warriors from different universes like buu, golden forms of frieza, cell... In Story mode, You will be immersed, transformed into stick z warriors, participating in battles in different saga. defeat each opponent in turn until the boss is destroyed. you will be the hero of universe.
Be the strongest, win and earn rewards! You will be never defeated, fight to become the legendary Warrior and take the wish of the stick dragon god.

-------CONTROL-------
+ Move, Attach, KI Blast, Dash, Block, Power, Transform
+ TAB Attach to combo.
+ Power + Attach: super attach
+ Power + KI Blast: Ki Beam, Final Flash. Death Beam
+ Special skill: Energy Ball, Dragon Strike, Death Ball, Big Bang Attack

-------GAME MODE-------
+ VERSUS: Train your skill to become the Legendary Warrior
+ TOURNAMENT: Join tournament, become the champion and get your big price
+ BOSS: Defeat boss, let them know who is the Legendary Warrior
+ STORY: Defeat your enemy to finish the challenges and get you reward

-------FEATURE-------
+ 100 Stick Character.
+ 10 Fantastic Maps
+ 4 Game Mode
+ Amazing Effect & Stick Graphic.
